Name: Caf√© 't Loosje

Name: Caf√© 't Loosje
Review Text: Very rude staff! “You don’t have to be here!” The guy refused to serve us at the bar and as we were waiting for a car pickup, the waitress came to turn off the heating lamp outside (the terrace was empty) ha ha ha! Too bad it’s a beautiful place and I’ve had many lovely moments there in the past.

Name: Caf√© 't Loosje
Review Text:
The staff left us to stand in the doorway for ages while we waited to be QR scanned. The food is very limited (no fries ).. the burger bun was rock hard.
The waitress was wasn't friendly... serving us seemed a hassle for her.

Name: Caf√© 't Loosje
Review Text: Nice bar, finger food options was good. Portion size and taste of the burger was suprisingly large and tasty. …

Name: Caf√© 't Loosje
Review Text: Each dish is like a art, colorful side dish or finger  food. The taste is awesome and nice ambience in Amsterdam!

Name: Caf√© 't Loosje
Review Text: Excellent table service- Parmezaaan ciabatta was really good!

Name: Caf√© 't Loosje
Review Text: Cool, relaxed setting positioned in front of a market place on a Saturday, good atmosphere. Then we eventually got served... 'Pint' was 3/4 full. Toastie (chorizo & cheese) took 45 minutes to come out, was bone dry and very average. Think I could've rustled one up better at home.

Name: Caf√© 't Loosje
Review Text: A well-rounded joint in the centre of Amsterdam. Great service, food well above average, good beer. What else can one ask for. I was glad to leave a tip (although not required in these lands). I would certainly recommend it and come back.

Name: Caf√© 't Loosje
Review Text: Nice place to sit down with friends for some beers. I keep coming back for years. Even though it has a touristic location you will always find local at this place.

Name: Caf√© 't Loosje
Review Text: One of the better bars in the very touristy area. They have good beers and it's indeed great people watching. Never eaten here, service can be a little slow but it's a really lovely old brown cafe

Name: Caf√© 't Loosje
Review Text: Outdoor seats are great. In-house seats were basically empty when I visited. Food and drinks were okay. Nothing much too exciting though. Good place for a momentary stop and rest.

Name: Caf√© 't Loosje
Review Text:
installed, order taken next to us and telling us then : we do not serve you saturated cuisine.

Name: Caf√© 't Loosje
Review Text: Delicious breakfast with toast, scrambled eggs, ham, cheese and jam. Fresh pressed orange juice and a coffee of choice for a moderate price. Waitress was very mindful and friendly. We can recommend this place for a breakfast.

Name: Caf√© 't Loosje
Review Text: Nice laid back place. Great for watching life go by. A smart selection of drinks and value for money food. My personal fav. If I had to choose would be eggs from the oven. Their nacho platter feeds a table. Highly recommended.

Name: Caf√© 't Loosje
Review Text: Superb food and service! Nice start of the holiday 🤩👏👏

Name: Caf√© 't Loosje
Review Text: We come here since years - cool and relaxing location of Nieuw Markt, super friendly service, you really feel at home there ! And a pretty good kitchen as well, really good for a beer bar ! We love coming here ❤😍👍 the employees really …

Name: Caf√© 't Loosje
Review Text: Good old bar/cafe. Here you will find both locals and tourists. Nice staff. Good service. A very nice out door serving with infra heaters. From here you have a good view over Nye Markt and the Square. A good place to sit and relax in. Recommended.

Name: Caf√© 't Loosje
Review Text: A very poor experience here, we sat down, the waitress took our order for drinks as we were looking at the menu for food, she delivered our drinks and went away. …

Name: Caf√© 't Loosje
Review Text: Got handed the worst pint of my life in this bar....if you gave this to a person in ireland it would cause a riot. I poured it into the half pint glass beside it and it was actually less than half a pint

Name: Caf√© 't Loosje
Review Text: Excellent waiters and great choices of beer. This place has local beers brewed in Netherlands, craft beers. It has also other options of bottle beers from outside, such as belgium, Germany and UK. If you are nearby, come here, it's pleasant to stay here.

Name: Caf√© 't Loosje
Review Text: very family

Name: Caf√© 't Loosje
Review Text: A very nice bar just a cross the street of the metro station Nieuwmarkt . Drinks are fairly priced for the location, the staffs were all super friendly and nice. We spend the night drinking there, the interior on the inside seating is also looking really nice. What a great experience!!!

Name: Caf√© 't Loosje
Review Text: The bar/ restaurant is definitely a must have for any young human who visits Amsterdam. The flair is pretty alternative, kindoff rocky and quaintly. My friends and me were searching for a not too expensive but not too classy place to eat, …

Name: Caf√© 't Loosje
Review Text: I visited two countries while in Europe and this establishment was the only rude experience I had.  From the moment the waitress came out there was attitude from her.  I am a very friendly person and very respectful to others.  She was not …

Name: Caf√© 't Loosje
Review Text:
Worst place I have ever visited.
As part of a group of 9, we walked in quietly and respectfully. 4 of our group stood at the bar to order pints while the rest of us seated ourselves at the back …

Name: Caf√© 't Loosje
Review Text:
A fantastic recommendation from a local. It was very busy but worth the wait. I ordered for everyone, the chicken was so good we ordered more. The decor was relaxing and the staff were smart, polite and efficient.
Would definitely go back.

Name: Caf√© 't Loosje
Review Text: Popped in for a cheeky drink before dinner and was met with friendly service and a great selection of drinks. Will definitely be coming back for some afternoon beers when its a bit warmer. 4.8 stars rounded up to 5 cause they serve Weihenstephan.

Name: Caf√© 't Loosje
Review Text: 't Loosje is situated on the Nieuwmarkt in an old building. The rustic interior is authentic and has not changed much over the years. Good beer and spirits selection. The simple dishes are the menu are OK nar food. One of the cosier places on the Nieuwmarkt with an extremely popular terrace when the weather permits it.

Name: Caf√© 't Loosje
Review Text: Delicious spot for Belgium beers!!!! Awesome staff. Great prices and the ambiance is just dope. Highly recommend if you’re passing thru or staying a while

Name: Caf√© 't Loosje
Review Text: The beauty of this bar is mostly that it hardly changed after the first time I visited 't Loosje, back in, well let's leave it at the end of last century. Fantastic beer choice with a lot from Amsterdam brewery het IJ, good food to go with …

Name: Caf√© 't Loosje
Review Text: Hereford Burger was good.  Good people watching in a good location.

Name: Caf√© 't Loosje
Review Text: Staff here was friendly and the service was propmt even during a busy lunch time. Food came out quickly and was very tasty. I would highly recommend this place for lunch if you're in the area.

Name: Caf√© 't Loosje
Review Text: I hate to give one star as I feel it's rarely fair to owners. However, I faced real shady practices in this bar tonight: the owner refused to split our bill (50€+ bill) because "it's too busy tonight we can't split bills" then refused to produce an invoice for my company which I needed to reimburse this meal.

Name: Caf√© 't Loosje
Review Text: Really nice and cool place. Had a really yummy grilled chicken wrap. Staff was ok, however the guys who served us gave us some tourist tips what to see around the city...

Name: Caf√© 't Loosje
Review Text: The staff here were incredibly rude to me and my friends as soon as we entered and continued to harass us until we left, telling us to go and drink on the street where it's illegal to carry open containers of alcohol. We're a query bunch so very odd and still not sure what we did!

Name: Caf√© 't Loosje
Review Text: Great finger food and fine beers ! We often come here when we are in Amsterdam. Clean and polite, a good place for a quick lunch !

Name: Caf√© 't Loosje
Review Text: Lovely outside seating area with heaters. Great selection of sandwiches and drinks. I recommend the Lumumba (hot chocolate with rum and whipped cream).
